site.name: GanzAfrica
site.description: Empowering youth through sustainable land management, agriculture, and environmental initiatives in Rwanda.

about.title: About GanzAfrica
about.description: GanzAfrica is dedicated to empowering youth through sustainable land management, agriculture, and environmental initiatives in Rwanda.

what_we_do.title: What We Do
what_we_do.description: We focus on sustainable food systems and climate change adaptation to create lasting impact in Rwanda.

fellowship.title: Fellowship Program
fellowship.description: Our fellowship program provides young leaders with the skills and opportunities to drive sustainable change.

alumni.title: Alumni Program
alumni.description: Our alumni network continues to collaborate and create impact long after their fellowship ends.

policy_support.title: Policy Support Program
policy_support.description: We provide research and guidance to support sustainable policy development.

hero.title: Sustainable Solutions for Rwanda's Future
hero.subtitle: Empowering youth through sustainable land management, agriculture, and environmental initiatives

food_system.title: Food System
food_system.subtitle: Rooted in Excellence, Growing with Agriculture
food_system.description: We strengthen the agriculture value chain by empowering farmers, improving sustainability, and shaping policy for a better future.
